events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on June 1st around 7 AM at the intersection downtown.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after verifying keywords related to car collision and vehicle damage.
Agent Williams was assigned to handle the customer's case promptly to ensure proper follow-up and support.
Customer received an acknowledgement email confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps.
Request sent to customer for submitting police report, photos of vehicle damage, and insurance card copies.
Customer uploaded and submitted all requested documents including photos and official police report.
Investigation began to assess the circumstances of the collision and validate all supporting evidence.
Final investigation report confirms liability and extent of vehicle damage consistent with reported accident.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs and rental car expenses for the duration of repairs.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt processing and clarity of the settlement offer.
Claim approved following customer's acceptance of settlement proposal and confirmation of damage assessment.
Payment was issued to the customer covering agreed settlement amounts for vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The claim was officially closed after payment disbursement and confirmation of vehicle repair completion.
All documents and case files were archived as per standard procedure for completed auto accident claims.
